titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Department of State, Administration of Foreign Affairs, Educational and Cultural Exchange Programs for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Department of State, Administration of Foreign Affairs, Educational and Cultural Exchange Programs for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill specifies that no FY2024 funding is authorized to be appropriated or made available for the Department of State's Educational and Cultural Exchange Programs.
